original_title: The End of the World Begins with One Lie
overview: "I deconstructed Flaherty’s film. Rearranged the order and changed the context of his scenes and used the music in many different ways even rearranging the music. His film gives the narrative structure to my film. Without it I could not have made The End Of The World Begins With A Lie. The End Of The World Begins With A Lie is about history. It is about the lie’s that we have been told and are continually being told in order to sell an ideology and material goods that we all want and need."
title: The End of the World Begins with One Lie
